articles.author: Nicole Wetsman
articles.title: Along with health and safety experts, we would like to remind you that Lysol is poison
articles.description: President Trump appeared to suggest injections of disinfectants might be a way to treat COVID-19. The EPA and the makers of Lysol both then stressed these products should not be used inside the body.
articles.content:
People have died after following Trumps medical advice
Photo by Roberto Machado Noa/LightRocket via Getty Images
The makers of Lysol, the Washington State Emergency Management Division, and the Environmental Protection Agency all scrambled to do damage contâ€¦ [+4249 chars]
